column4: I cannot open most of the pages using either Firefox or IE also i can not connect to most of the IRC servers ???
sorry i meant Most of the WEB pages
and when i try to connect to IRC servers i get Connection Timed Out
how do i know whether they resolve in DNS or not
well sorry to say im using XP and not ubuntu i thought some1 could help here
what made you think of coming to the ubuntu linux channel for winxp help?
go int o command prompt and type "netsh winsock reset catalog"
roe i tried that command and got this Default Server:  dnscache1.singnet.com.sg
it says i have to reboot in order to complete the reset
well i think it is a problem with DNS
